OK This is the additional information...

1. There is NOT any development or maintenance because it is done
    at the head office and the server is in New York.

2.  Should be very familiar with Banking business.

3.  Need to communicate with clients such as CPA (Canadian
    Paymemnt Association: controls the reconciliation among Banks.).

4.  Get requirements for a new policy, product  or program,  
    write  specs,  conduct teating of new products, communicate with
    Head office and New York.

5. Need to have broad experiences or skill sets on  in I/T (Internet,
    banking business, etc)

6.  Need to speak/write English as well as Korean.

7. Salary is negotiable depending on experience.

  Good Luck.
